content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide a detailed solution.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure has multiple layers and consists of different colored blocks (orange, yellow, and blue)
- The base has 4 orange cylindrical pillars
- A yellow horizontal platform rests on top of the pillars
- Above the platform: orange vertical cylinder, orange triangular slopes, blue cube, and yellow curved top

Block count and arrangement:
- 4 orange cylindrical pillars (using block #8)
- 2 yellow horizontal rectangular blocks for platform (using block #4)
- 1 blue cube (using block #1)
- 2 orange triangular slopes (using block #14)
- 1 orange vertical cylinder (using block #8)
- 1 yellow curved top piece (using block #10)

Assembly order from bottom to top:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 8
    Step2: Move block with index 8
    Step3: Move block with index 8
    Step4: Move block with index 8
    Step5: Move block with index 4
    Step6: Move block with index 4
    Step7: Move block with index 8
    Step8: Move block with index 14
    Step9: Move block with index 1
    Step10: Move block with index 14
    Step11: Move block with index 10
}

This sequence will create the structure shown in the target image, starting from the base pillars and working up to the curved yellow top piece.
